66774.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ギャンブラーの:
Welcome to Casino, a gambler's paradise! This is the place where dreams of making a fortune come true. Enjoy yourself to your heart's
content You can only use Casino Tokens in this room, so please buy coins at the counter at the entrance The main room is located
at the end of the door. On the left side is the area where you can play with as little as 1 coin. On the right side is an area where you
can play with as little as 10 coins Also, there is a huge bingo table by the wall where you can bet as big as 250 or 500 coins At
the back of the main room, there is a special room called the ''Rairu Room'' which only VIP License holders are allowed to enter. VIP Room
is located in the back of the main room. This is a high-risk, high-return area where you can play with as little as 100 coins.
